message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with theoretical analysis of algorithms for k-armed adversarial bandits, which is a subfield of machine learning and optimization. The focus is on regret bounds, variance analysis, and degree of separation of the arms. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves information theory (cs.IT) and game theory (cs.GT) concepts, which are relevant to the analysis of adversarial bandits.
